short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prompt manager for ChatGPT power users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Important! Few, üòÆ the world of GPT moves so fast...

This extension was developed for people like me to utilize ChatGPT for work more efficiently. But the problem it was trying to solve was solved by recent updates to ChatGPT itself.

Instead of focusing on copy-pasting prompts, I would recommend creating personal collection of conversation presets, by using "Share" button. This approach is much simpler, and doesn't require maintenance of external add-ons.

Or explore recent MyGPTs feature, which is even more cool üòé!

Hope it was useful for some.
‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you for showing interest.

FYI, with OhMyPrompt, you could:
üß† Save good prompts for later;
ü§å Use @variables in your prompts;
üóÇÔ∏è Organize prompts into projects.
